Room.Name: Amberton Lane/Hillborough Way Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Hillborough Way and Amberton Lane.
Room.LongDescription: Amberton Lane continues north and south through the intersection with Hillborough Way, which runs east and west. The Knightly Orders of the White and Black Cross are located on the northeast and southeast corners respectively. To the southwest, you can see Altihmin's Academy of Advanced Fighting Techniques.
